item.title: About Francisco Pereira de Lucena
item.description: A full-stack developer with 4+ years of experience working on scalable software applications in various roles and settings. A legal permanent resident living in the United States, Italian national, born in Argentina. Highly adept at wielding English and Spanish to bridge cultural divides and provide impeccable customer service.
